original_text: And he came up, and told his father and his mother, and said, I have seen a woman in Timnath of the daughters of the Philistines: now therefore get her for me to wife.
korean_text: 올라와서 자기 부모에게 말하여 이르되 내가 딤나에서 블레셋 사람의 딸들 중에서 한 여자를 보았사오니 이제 그를 맞이하여 내 아내로 삼게 하소서 하매

sentences.original_text: and told his father and his mother,
of the daughters of the Philistines:
now therefore get her for me to wife.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 그녀를 나의 아내로 삼아 주십시오.
